text: The Grammy Award for Best Pop Solo Performance is an award presented at the Grammy Awards. The Best Pop Solo Performance Award was designed for a solo performance pop recording. The category was created at the 54th Annual Grammy Awards in 2012 and combined the previous categories for Best Female Pop Vocal Performance, Best Male Pop Vocal Performance and Best Pop Instrumental Performance. The award goes to the performing artist. The producer, engineer and songwriter can apply for a Winners Certificate ==References== Category:Grammy Awards
title: Grammy Award for Best Pop Solo Performance
